check_target: Verification that the netlist and SPEF file versions match expected or compatible values

involved_formats.name: STA_Log
involved_formats.role: Contains file paths and references to netlist and SPEF files used in STA run

involved_formats.name: SPEF
involved_formats.role: Target file containing parasitic data with version information to verify

involved_formats.name: Netlist_Verilog
involved_formats.role: Target file containing synthesized netlist with version comment or metadata

data_flow: STA_Log → extract file paths → parse SPEF *VERSION field and Netlist version comments → verify against expected version patterns
extraction_chain: STA_Log → extract SPEF file path → parse SPEF *VERSION field → extract Netlist file path → parse Netlist version comment → compare both versions with expected values or compatibility rules
success_criteria: SPEF *VERSION field matches expected version format (e.g., IEEE 1481-1999) AND Netlist version comment matches expected tool version or format specification
failure_criteria: SPEF *VERSION field is missing, malformed, or incompatible OR Netlist version comment is missing or indicates incompatible version

format_hints.SPEF: IEEE 1481 standard format, *VERSION field typically in header (e.g., 'IEEE 1481-1998', 'IEEE 1481-1999')
format_hints.Netlist_Verilog: Verilog format, version info typically in header comments generated by synthesis tool
format_hints.STA_Log: Tool-specific log format containing read_spef and read_verilog commands with file paths
